original_text: When all Israel heard the verdict the king had given, they held the king in awe, because they saw that he had wisdom from God to administer justice.
korean_text: 온 이스라엘이 왕이 심리하여 판결함을 듣고 왕을 두려워하였으니 이는 하나님의 지혜가 그의 속에 있어 판결함을 봄이더라

sentences.original_text: When all Israel heard the verdict
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 이스라엘이 그 판결을 들었을 때

sentences.original_text: they held the king in awe
that he had wisdom from God
